column1: # Load File Generator - Sample Metadata CSV
This is a sample CSV file showing the expected format for document metadata.
- Subsequent rows: Metadata for each document
- Optional: "FileName" column to match with PDF files
- **FileName**: Name of the PDF file (used for matching)
1. You can add any custom fields you need
2. All fields will appear in the generated DAT file

column2: metadata will be assigned in order
